sect1.title: Inversion of Control / Dependency Injection
sect1.para: Early 2004, Martin Fowler asked the readers of his site: when talking about Inversion of Control: "the question, is what aspect of control are they inverting?". After talking a bit about the term Inversion of Control Martin suggests to rename the pattern or at least, give it a more self-explanatory name and starts to use the term Dependency Injection. His article continues to explain some of the ideas behind Inversion of Control or Dependency Injection. If you need a decent insight: http://martinfowler.com/articles/injection.html.
